titleStmt.title: A Latin Dictionary
Machine readable text
titleStmt.author: Charlton T. Lewis
Charles Short
titleStmt.funder: The National Endowment for the Humanities

monogr.title: A Latin Dictionary
Founded on Andrews' edition of Freund's Latin dictionary

respStmt.resp: revised, enlarged, and in great part rewritten by
respStmt.name: Charlton T. Lewis, Ph.D.
Charles Short, LL.D.

change.item:
2019-10-31 Lisa Cerrato created new file with Greek beta code to Unicode transformation 2019-10-30 Lisa Cerrato removed and replaced entities manually; for combining characters that do not have a single glyph unicode equivalent, some marks, such as macron, appear following the character(s); fixed tei addresss 2016-01-20 Lisa Cerrato Edited entry corrumpo changed rāpi, to rūpī as reported by user shomauno
$Log: ls.xml,v $ Revision 1.2 2014-07-09 12:30:00 akrohn01 replaced most abo ids or abbreviations in bibl tags with cts urns or Trismegistos urls in the case of papyri
Revision 1.1 2014-07-08 17:33:50 lcerrato latest version of file 08-Jul-14
Revision 1.30 2014-06-20 19:00:09 lcerrato typo 24872.6 il to it
Revision 1.29 2013-09-30 19:11:01 lcerrato incorrect reference in labor2
Revision 1.28 2013-09-26 19:31:51 lcerrato changed nandsome to handsome n501.1
Revision 1.27 2013-09-26 19:21:05 lcerrato fixed typo in entry n17775.1 aique to atque
Revision 1.26 2013-09-26 18:25:39 lcerrato fixed typo in entry calidus in greek where gamma was listed for upsilon as gdata and it should be udata
Revision 1.25 2013-03-29 16:12:31 lcerrato split entry for daemon1 and adjusted draco1
Revision 1.24 2013-01-30 21:49:07 lcerrato fixed refs 4.16.2 to 6.16.2; 70.13 to 70.16; ciothe to clothe, and trans of litus3
Revision 1.23 2012-02-22 22:03:23 lcerrato fixed small typo
Revision 1.22 2011-10-04 20:09:19 lcerrato fixing bad bibl refs
Revision 1.21 2011-09-23 20:05:30 lcerrato fixed tagging around definition in juvo entry in order to improve word study tool results
Revision 1.20 2011-09-22 19:53:42 lcerrato fixed bibls which should point to Rut. Lup. not Afran.
Revision 1.19 2011-09-22 17:47:05 lcerrato fixed 2 John and 3 John bibls

Revision 1.13 2010/09/29 20:02:27 lcerrato changed back tagging done in 1.11 re Juvo entry as this was the wrong way to fix the error
Revision 1.12 2010/09/29 17:46:43 lcerrato fixed incorrect spacing in phrase pater quartum vel potius millesimum
Revision 1.11 2010/09/29 17:32:53 lcerrato fixed missing trans tag in Juvo

Revision 1.9 2010/08/12 20:52:10 lcerrato added refs to Augustine

Revision 1.1 2009/12/01 18:28:21 rsingh04 moved more xml files around based on copyright status

Revision 1.7 2004/10/07 14:01:21 packel caught an ë with no trailing ;

Revision 1.5 2004/09/21 15:44:45 packel numbered lots of lingering duplicate entries (all of them, we hope)
Revision 1.4 2004/09/01 20:45:17 packel Set a couple hundred mislabeled keys to the values in their orth tags (e.g., "ex" to "exporrigo").
Revision 1.3 2004/06/15 19:20:19 lcerrato 1. beluatis: marked (bell-) section 2. orior: mjuria to injuria 3. verto: aller to alter 4. latus: sems to senis 5. k: scund to sound 6. faex: less to lees 7. siren: fuei to fuci 8. obligatio: piedging to pledging 9. anceps: hazaraous to hazardous 10. praeceptum: monitig to monitis 11. crgasterium to ergasterium 12. abductio: foroible to forcible 13. animus: an mus to animus 14. parastas: delermine to determine 15. obsequium: comptiance to compliance 16. gloria: laddis to laudis

Revision 1.1 2003/01/09 22:57:38 amahoney make these the canonical forms, no longer generated

div0.head: A
div0.entryFree: cāmus, i, m., = κημός (Dor. καμός). A muzzle for horses (only in eccl. Lat.), Vulg. Psa. 31, 9; Ambros. Hex. 6, 3.—* Perh. a kind of collar for the neck, Non. p. 200, 16 (Trag. Rel. v. 302 Rib.). †† cana, Gr. (*κάνεον, plur. κάνεα κάνη, a wicker basket) for canistra, acc. to Paul. ex Fest. p. 45 Müll.
cānăba (or cannăba), ae, f. kindr. with κάναβος and κάννα; acc. to others, with καλύβη, a hovel, hut, Aug. Serm. 61, de Temp.; Inscr. Orell. 39; 4077.
